NYU-HiTS - Google Groups       NYU-HiTS   Dear Biology Department: We have created a Google Group email list for the NYU-HiTS seminar series. For those of you who unaware, NYU-HiTS is a next generation sequencing applications and analyses seminar series. The meeting is held monthly to discuss experimental and analytical methods related to high-throughput sequencing (HiTS). Best regards, Carrie Nygard NYU-HiTS Seminar Series Coordinator  ---  Carrie Nygard  Administrative Assistant      New York University  Center for Genomics and Systems Biology  12-16 Waverly Place  8th Floor  New York, N.Y.  10003  T:  212.998.8341 , F:  212.995.4266   cen249@nyu.edu          Showing 1-20 of 50 topics   Fwd: Genome Engineering seminar March 9   Tara   3/5/15  FINAL REMINDER: GenCore Annual Update Meeting -
